scripts.dev: budo client/index.js --live --pushstate -- -t [ sheetify/transform -u sheetify-cssnext ] -t es2020 -g yo-yoify
scripts.build: browserify client/index.js -t [ sheetify/transform -u sheetify-cssnext ] -t es2020 -p [ css-extract -o dist/bundle.css ] | uglifyjs -mc > dist/index.js && cssnano dist/bundle.css dist/bundle.min.css
scripts.disc: browserify client/index.js --full-paths -t [ sheetify/transform -u sheetify-cssnext ] -t es2020  -p [ css-extract -o dist/bundle.css ] | discify > disc.html
